About MyTraveler

We are a group of passionate students from MSA University, building a real-world flight booking application to demonstrate our software engineering skills.

Our Story

MyTraveler started as a university project at MSA University in 6th of October City, Egypt. Our team of computer science students wanted to challenge ourselves by building something meaningfulâ€”a full-featured flight booking platform that people could actually use.

We integrated real flight data from the AviationStack API, implemented secure user authentication, and designed a beautiful, responsive interface that works seamlessly on any device.

This project represents hundreds of hours of coding, debugging, and learning. We're proud of what we've built and excited to continue improving it.

MSA University

Computer Science Students

What Drives Us

Our core values guide every line of code we write

Our Mission

To create a seamless and accessible flight booking experience for travelers in the Middle East and beyond.

Innovation

We leverage modern technologies to build solutions that make travel planning effortless.

Passion

Built with love and dedication by a team of aspiring software engineers.

Learning

This project represents our journey of learning and applying real-world software development skills.
